00018 #ifndef __Antenna_Input__
00019 #define __Antenna_Input__
00020 
00021 #include <vector>
00022 #include "BaseInput.h"
00023 
00024 /*
00025                                           - - - ANTENNA INPUT PARAMETERS - - -
00026 
00027    TAG   SEG.    VOLTAGE (VOLTS)         CURRENT (AMPS)         IMPEDANCE (OHMS)        ADMITTANCE (MHOS)      POWER
00028    NO.   NO.    REAL        IMAG.       REAL        IMAG.       REAL        IMAG.       REAL        IMAG.     (WATTS)
00029      0 *   5 1.00000E+00 0.00000E+00 6.64451E-03-3.86651E-03 1.12429E+02 6.54238E+01 6.64451E-03-3.86651E-03 3.32225E-03
00030 
00031                        --------- ANTENNA INPUT PARAMETERS ---------
00032   TAG   SEG       VOLTAGE (VOLTS)         CURRENT (AMPS)         IMPEDANCE (OHMS)        ADMITTANCE (MHOS)     POWER
00033   NO.   NO.     REAL      IMAGINARY     REAL      IMAGINARY     REAL      IMAGINARY    REAL       IMAGINARY   (WATTS)
00034     0     5  1.0000E+00  0.0000E+00  6.6443E-03 -3.8666E-03  1.1243E+02  6.5428E+01  6.6443E-03 -3.8666E-03  3.3222E-03
00035 */
00036 class AntennaInput : public BaseInput
00037 {
00038 public: 
00039         vector<double> tag, seg, vRe, vIm, iRe, iIm, zRe, zIm, power;
00040         long n_items;
00041 
00042         AntennaInput(istream& if1)
00043         {
00044                 n_items = 0;
00045                 string searchString("ANTENNA INPUT PARAMETERS");
00046                 while (if1.good())
00047                 {
00048                 string line = readline(if1);
00049 
00050                 if (line.find(searchString,0) != string::npos)
00051                 {
00052                         while (line.find("(WATTS)",0) == string::npos)
00053                                 line = readline(if1);
00054 
00055                         line = readline(if1);
00056 
00057                         // get rid of '*' characters
00058                         if (line.find("*",0) != string::npos)
00059                         {
00060                                 line.erase(line.find("*",0),1);
00061                         }
00062                         
00063                         stringstream ss(line);
00064                         tag.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00065                         seg.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00066                         vRe.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00067                         vIm.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00068                         iRe.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00069                         iIm.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00070                         zRe.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00071                         zIm.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00072                         power.push_back(read_fixed(ss));
00073 
00074                         cout << "Impedance : " << zRe[n_items] << " " << zIm[n_items] << endl;
00075                         n_items++;
00076                 }       
00077                 }
00078         }
00079 
00080         bool equalto(const AntennaInput& ai)
00081         {
00082                 if (difference(ai) > 1e-4)
00083                         return false;
00084 
00085                 return true;
00086         }
00087 
00088         double difference(const AntennaInput& ai)
00089         {
00090                 double ret = 0;
00091 
00092                 if (n_items != ai.n_items)
00093                         return 1.0;
00094 
00095                 try
00096                 {
00097                 for (long i=0; i<n_items; i++)
00098                 {
00099                         ret += diff(ai.vRe[i],vRe[i]);
00100                         ret += diff(ai.vIm[i],vIm[i]);
00101                         ret += diff(ai.iRe[i],iRe[i]);
00102                         ret += diff(ai.iIm[i],iIm[i]);
00103                         ret += diff(ai.zRe[i],zRe[i]);
00104                         ret += diff(ai.zIm[i],zIm[i]);
00105                         ret += diff(ai.power[i],power[i]);
00106                 }
00107                 }
00108                 catch(string message)
00109                 {
00110                         cout << "diff : " << message << endl;
00111                 }
00112                 return ret;
00113         };
00114 };
00115 
00116 #endif /* __Antenna_Input__ */
